data.actual_result: The text is in line with your message, but the emojis are raised out of place
data.expected_result: In reality, the emoji should be in line with the other text and a bit larger, like it usually is
data.short_description: When in a message with words, emojis are raised higher than the text
data.steps_to_repro: - go to server of choice - type a message (doesn't matter what it says) and add an emoji - look at result
